title: The new patch did good for Akali, but...
body:
Allow us to detonate her Q with either her ult or her E, god bless Riot, ty.

The only way to not get smashed in the laning phase is if its a melee, not zed either, as he's cancer and has better damage than Akali, better escape, and not as cheap of a counter.

Buff my waifu.
